content.rendered:
[vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” el_class=”text-center”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Believing in unlimited possibilities, we are always ready to bring to life what is envisioned to our events. Whether you are planning an event for thousands or you need a branded experience in any of our events, Pulse Active has the broad experience, creative power and strategic thinking you need. Right from the start, we set the stage for a groundbreaking event.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”1/3″]

STRATEGY

Research, target understanding, competitor analysis and trends exploration help us to create meaningful events as well as identify the best opportunities for brands to engage with participants.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

CREATIVITY

We are an idea-driven business fueled by the pursuit of change. We aim to make our participant live new experiences so that those have a deeper positive impact.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

LONG TERM

It’s not just about strategy and creativity, those needs to be combined with a strong focus on the participant experience. This is key to increase our event returning rate and build a lasting engaging feeling towards your brand.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
We always Work-Hard to produce the contents which offers the rich experiences for user.
LET’S GET STARTED
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”EVENT PLANNING & MANAGEMENT” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_text_separator title=”What do we offer?”][vc_column_text]We provide full-service solutions for concept & theme development, staffing, crisis management, production & execution.

We bring creativity, passion & quality to every event.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1160″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”EVENT MARKETING” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_text_separator title=”What do we offer?”][vc_column_text]We power your brands.

We ensure your event has the most incredible impact.

We offer brand strategy, brand consultancy, public relations, digital marketing, media, social media planning/support campaigns, and strategic partnerships.

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1166″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”BRAND ACTIVATION & CONSULTANCY ” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_text_separator title=”What do we offer?”][vc_column_text]We create unforgettable, unique brand experiences anywhere customers engage your Brand thereby securing brand partiality, loyalty, as well as an increase of sales.

We consult our sponsors & partners to plan tailored strategies while aligning with business objectives through massive brand exposure and a great opportunity to engage with potential customers.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1162″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”REGISTRATION & TICKETING ” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_text_separator title=”What do we offer?”][vc_column_text]We provide all of the online registration and ticketing tools to help you create your payment service from online to offline.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1169″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”LOYALTY PLATFORM” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_text_separator title=”What do we offer?”][vc_column_text]We offer a unique, innovative and non-traditional loyalty platform for our valued partners: Consumer Data Analysis, Loyalty Points, Loyalty Campaign Creation, Marketing Automation, Incentives Program,  Affiliate Marketing or Loyalty System Customisation[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578641497028{background-color: #c9c9c9 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_empty_space]

More Questions? Send Us A

MESSAGE
[vc_column_text]

For General Information: info@pulse.vn

For Sponsorship: sponsor@pulse.vn

For Media & Communication: marketing@pulse.vn

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”42px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
